Are you sure you want to restart the game?

This project was for the class 420-503-AL - Programmation d\'interfaces utilisateur. 
This application is inspired from the iddle game type. 
You only need to hit the work button and watch the green progress bar go! 
However, in order to speed things up, you can buy programmers who will work for you instead! 
Each programmer has a unique currency required in order to buy them. 
Each of these currencies are obtained randomly every 5 seconds accordingly to the timer. 
There is 24 levels in the game, one for each class in the computer science program from cegep André-Laurendeau. Also, the more you advance through the game, the harder it is to make progress, so don't forget to keep buying programmers! 
There is a random event every minute that influences your codes per second. 
Each level, you have 3 minutes to complete it, otherwise the game downgrades you one level, currencies and programmers will not be lost. 
Once the game is complete, a game over screen will appear indicating the total amount taken to beat the game and the amount of farmers bought. 
At the game over screen, you may hit the restart button to go back to level 1 with no currencies and programmers. You will be rewarded a gift instead. 
Everytime you restart, the game exponentially increases your codes per tap. 
At all times, you can decide to restart manually from the menu section, if you do, everything will be lost, including the upgraded codes per tap. 
You may also change the background color from the menu section. 
Legal Section: I am not the author nor the owner of any of the images within this application, everything was created from Android Studio. I am only responsible for the logic aspect of the application and it's layouts (Positionning, texts, colors) 
-Tiberiu Cristian Suciu 2016
